description: Sarutobi Hiruzen was the student of the first two Hokages, http://anidb.net/ch8859 [Senju Hashirama] and http://anidb.net/ch8862 [Senju Tobirama], and the teacher of http://anidb.net/ch7213 [Jiraiya], http://anidb.net/ch8606 [Tsunade], and http://anidb.net/ch8603 [Orochimaru].
name: Sarutobi Hiruzen
